text:
[Verse 1]
Floating aimlessly
No land in sight
Waves keep crashing
Day turns to night

[Verse 2]
Stars above twinkle
Moon shines so bright
Lost but not lonely
Guided by light

[Chorus]
Lost at sea
Lost but free
Wandering waves
Just you and me

[Verse 3]
Driftwood sailing
Endless blue
Whispers of wind
Calling for you

[Verse 4]
Silent ocean
Depths unknown
Feel the rhythm
Heart finds home

[Chorus]
Lost at sea
Lost but free
Wandering waves
Just you and me
title: Lost at Sea
